title: Monday Post Show (04-11-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (04-11-22)
description:
Bobby addresses what happened during the live show and why it was chaos. Lunchbox get his penalty for not listening during Friday’s show.  Mike D reviews Ambulance. We get examples of Amy buffering during the show. Raymundo says our old intern got robbed on her MTV shows. We get into talk of drama shows about real events.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
